kickstart.post:
if test -d /opt/opal; then
# autodock 4 autodockver=4.2.3 autodock_bin=/opt/cadd/bin/run_autodock.py if test -e $autodock_bin; then $ANT -f $OPALXML deploy -DserviceName=autodock_${autodockver} -DappConfig=$OPALCONFIG/autodock_$autodockver.xml fi
# autogrid 4 autogridver=4.2.3 autogrid_bin=/opt/mgltools/bin/autogrid4 if test -e $autogrid_bin; then $ANT -f $OPALXML deploy -DserviceName=autogrid_${autogridver} -DappConfig=$OPALCONFIG/autogrid_$autogridver.xml fi
# vina 1.1.2 vinaver=1.1.2 vina_bin=/opt/mgltools/bin/vina if test -e $vina_bin; then $ANT -f $OPALXML deploy -DserviceName=vina_${vinaver} -DappConfig=$OPALCONFIG/vina_$vinaver.xml fi
fi
